forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a low around 56. South southeast wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 44 in the afternoon. Southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 8pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 28. Northwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 47. West southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Today
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 3 to 7 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow and a slight chance of sleet before 5pm. Cloudy. High near 33, with temperatures falling to around 27 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of 3 to 7 inches possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 20. Northwest wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Slight Chance Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers after 5pm. Mostly sunny. High near 42, with temperatures falling to around 39 in the afternoon. South wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Snow Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers before 8pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 31. South wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Today
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 3 to 5 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain and rain and snow before 9am, then sleet and freezing rain and rain and snow between 9am and 5pm. Cloudy. High near 35, with temperatures falling to around 27 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of 3 to 5 inches possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 17, with temperatures rising to around 19 overnight. Northwest wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 43, with temperatures falling to around 39 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 0 to 15 mph.

forecast.name: Monday Night

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs has plenty of coverage , depth , and groom on the upper loops. The sweet spot between hard and soft was 10:30 to 1:00. A little bit of wind debris , but not an issue . LF 8 rilled

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 6 Lifts, Rope Tow and Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are in late season. Expect bare spots, especially on the lower trails.
nubsNob.comments: What a difference a day makes. This morning it is raining at Nub's but that is forecast to change to snow soon with some accumulation expected. The groomers are out in full force this morning. As the snow begins to freeze expect variable conditions on the slopes. Today is TELEbration sponsored by our friends at The Outfitter of Harbor Springs. This is a great chance to try a pair of demo telemark skis and hang out with your free-heel friends at the warming hut at the bottom of Birch Run. NASTAR Racing today from 12:30 to 2:30 PM. Pintail Peak lodge is open with a deli and an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
